trends: There have been no other sightings in Gowen
This sighting has never been favorited.
Summary: bright star-like image with nike swoosh like light connected following behind was another star like object
divs: Sighting DetailsI reported the same type lights last night. Tonight they seemed to be the same but on a different direction. Still sort of SW to NE. The lead object had a light connected to it---a nike shaped swoosh. the beam came off from the object and curved back around. The following object was farther behind than last night by half of the span of the sky. I took my flashlight and blinked it at the object, and within seconds the lead object was no where to be found as well as the following.
